name: BANX
description: Borrow ● Lend ● Multiply ● Hedge ◎ Solana tokens and NFTs on https://banx.gg with no expiration, no price liquidation. Banx is a modular peer-to-peer lending protocol enabling borrowers and lenders to choose their risk/reward parameters (LTV/APR), anywhere from very low to very high. The more $BANX you own and stake, the stronger the (financial) benefits you receive such as weekly $BANX rewards (from buybacks), boosts on leaderboard points, governance voting power, ...
